featured.text: Mr. Smith won't tolerate talking during class; he says it others.
The students in Professor Smith’s classical Chinese class are required to _____
You can be an everyday Jane Doe or John Smith while awake but a superhero while sleeping, 30 who you are in real life.

other.text: Mr. Smith’s work in Taiwan is just _____.
David Smith refers to himself as having been “a clothes addict,” because _________.
David Smith wears casual clothes now, because _________.

definition.zh_def: 鍛造工，尤其是金屬工匠，負責製作和修理金屬物品。
definition.en_def: A person who works with metal, especially one who forges and shapes it into tools, weapons, or other objects.
definition.example: The blacksmith crafted a beautiful horseshoe from a piece of iron.
